overview: This subject progresses from Screenwriting Practices 2A with a focus on genre screenwriting for the screen media. Examining Science Fiction, Romance, Thriller, Fantasy, and Horror storytelling conventions, students develop a basic working knowledge of these popular forms as explored by screenwriters.

Students participate in Story Teams to complete in-class exercises in genre storytelling and write a 30-page screenplay anchored in the conventions of a genre chosen from those examined in the subject.
This subject is co-delivered with FLTV20008 Genre Screenwriting.
